attributes.additional_details:
My Name is Elysce I'm 11 years old, and I want to stop the closure of the our local libraries in Liverpool. The closure of 11 libraries across Liverpool are at risk. Reading is a magical thing and books should be available to all. Someone once said
 "In the library one often finds, people close their mouths and open their minds"
A library to me is a place of magic and should be valued- Please help me to keep the government from closing our libraries.
